    • Constructor Detail

      • Deck

        public Deck()
        Constructs a regular 52-card deck. Initially, the cards are in a sorted order. The shuffle() method can be called to randomize the order.

      • freshDeck

        public void freshDeck()
        Create a new collection of 52 cards, in sorted order

        Randomize the order of Cards in Deck
